definitions.definition: The act of enunciating, announcing, proclaiming, or making known; open attestation; declaration.
definitions.example: It was time for the enunciation of an important truth.

definitions.definition: Mode of utterance or pronunciation, especially as regards fullness and distinctness or articulation.
definitions.example: She speaks with an impressively clear enunciation.

definitions.definition: That which is enunciated or announced; words in which a proposition is expressed; formal declaration
